geospatialAI.name: SatelliteImageAnalysis
geospatialAI.label: Satellite Image Analysis with AI
geospatialAI.description: Custom deep learning solutions for satellite imagery classification, segmentation, and anomaly detection
deliverables: Custom trained model on your imagery
Web dashboard for uploading and analyzing new images

geospatialAI.name: GeospatialLLM
geospatialAI.label: Geospatial Large Language Models
geospatialAI.description: Fine-tuned LLMs for geospatial content understanding, query processing, and location-based insights generation
deliverables: API for natural language geospatial queries

geospatialAI.name: ObjectDetection
geospatialAI.label: Geospatial Object Detection
geospatialAI.description: Custom CV models for detecting and classifying objects in aerial and satellite imagery

geospatialAI.name: ChangeDetection
geospatialAI.label: AI-Powered Change Detection
geospatialAI.description: Temporal analysis of geospatial data to identify and classify changes over time
deliverables: Change detection algorithm customized to your data
Data export in standard GIS formats

geospatialAI.name: SpatialPredictiveModeling
geospatialAI.label: Spatial Predictive Modeling
geospatialAI.description: AI models that incorporate spatial relationships to predict future conditions or optimize resource allocation

automations.name: AIIntegration
automations.label: AI Integration for Geospatial
automations.description: Seamless integration with major AI providers (OpenAI, Google, Anthropic) customized for processing geospatial data with sophisticated content understanding
deliverables: API integration layer for multiple AI services
Custom prompt engineering for geospatial contexts

automations.name: RetrievalSystems
automations.label: Geospatial RAG Systems
automations.description: Advanced retrieval augmented generation systems specifically designed for geospatial data with vector search and context-aware retrieval
deliverables: Custom vector database for geospatial data

automations.name: MultiAgentSystems
automations.label: Geospatial Multi-Agent Systems
automations.description: Orchestrated AI agent networks specifically designed for complex geospatial workflows with built-in spatial reasoning capabilities

automations.name: InteractiveMaps
automations.label: AI-Enhanced Interactive Maps
automations.description: Web-based interactive mapping applications with integrated AI for dynamic visualization and user-adaptive interfaces

automations.name: GeoDataWrangling
automations.label: AI-Assisted Geospatial Data Wrangling
automations.description: Intelligent ETL pipelines for geospatial data using GeoPandas, Shapely, and ML-enhanced data cleaning
deliverables: Custom ETL pipeline for your specific data

automations.name: CustomGISolutions
automations.label: AI-Enhanced GIS Solutions
automations.description: Custom solutions integrating QGIS, ArcGIS Pro, and Python with AI capabilities for intelligent spatial analysis

automations.name: GeoWorkflows
automations.label: Intelligent Geospatial Workflows
automations.description: AI-optimized pipelines for processing, analyzing and visualizing geospatial data with smart validation and error handling

automations.name: WorkflowAutomation
automations.label: Geospatial Digital Twins
automations.description: End-to-end digital twin systems for geospatial assets with AI-powered simulation and optimization capabilities

automations.name: GeospatialModelDeploymentMonitoring
automations.label: Geospatial AI Model Deployment & Monitoring
automations.description: Setup and configuration of infrastructure for deploying, monitoring (performance, drift, data quality), and managing the lifecycle of geospatial AI models in production environments.
deliverables: Model deployment pipeline (e.g., containerized service, serverless function)
Monitoring dashboard for model performance and operational metrics
Alerting system for performance degradation or anomalies
Documentation for deployment and monitoring procedures
useCases: Production deployment of predictive geospatial models
Ensuring reliability and accuracy of AI services over time
Automated retraining triggers based on performance
Compliance and audit logging for model predictions

automations.name: AutomatedGeospatialDataIngestion
automations.label: Automated Geospatial Data Ingestion Pipeline
automations.description: Design and implementation of robust, automated pipelines to ingest various geospatial data formats (vector, raster, point clouds, tabular) from diverse sources (APIs, FTP, cloud storage, databases) into a centralized system.
deliverables: Support for specified data sources and formats
Data validation and basic quality checks upon ingestion
Logging and monitoring for ingestion jobs
useCases: Building a centralized geospatial data lake or warehouse
Regularly updating datasets from external providers
Integrating data from field collection devices
Standardizing data from multiple departments or sources

automations.name: RealtimeGeospatialStreamProcessing
automations.label: Real-time Geospatial Stream Processing
automations.description: Development of systems to process and analyze high-velocity geospatial data streams in near real-time using technologies like Kafka, Flink, Spark Streaming, or cloud-native services.
deliverables: Integration with data stream sources (e.g., IoT sensors, vehicle GPS)
Real-time analytics or event detection logic
Dashboard for monitoring stream throughput and latency
useCases: Real-time vehicle tracking and fleet management
Live environmental sensor monitoring and alerting

automations.name: AutomatedGeospatialReporting
automations.label: Automated Geospatial Reporting System
automations.description: Building automated systems to generate customized reports (e.g., PDF, interactive web reports) incorporating maps, charts, statistical summaries, and AI-driven insights derived from geospatial data.
deliverables: Scheduled report generation and distribution (e.g., email, portal)
User interface for on-demand report generation (optional)
useCases: Periodic market analysis reports with maps

apiIntegrations.name: ArcGIS
apiIntegrations.label: ArcGIS API Integration
apiIntegrations.description: Enterprise-grade integration with Esri's ArcGIS Platform with custom workflows and automated data synchronization

apiIntegrations.name: GoogleMaps
apiIntegrations.label: Google Maps API Integration
apiIntegrations.description: Advanced integration of Google Maps Platform for location services, geocoding, and custom mapping functionality

apiIntegrations.name: AWS
apiIntegrations.label: AWS GeoSpatial Services
apiIntegrations.description: Comprehensive integration with Amazon Location Service, SageMaker geospatial capabilities, and serverless processing

apiIntegrations.name: Azure
apiIntegrations.label: Azure Maps & Spatial Services
apiIntegrations.description: Full Microsoft Azure spatial services integration with ML capabilities and enterprise security features

apiIntegrations.name: Mapbox
apiIntegrations.label: Mapbox GL Integration
apiIntegrations.description: Custom implementation of Mapbox GL JS for high-performance vector mapping with optimized data visualization

apiIntegrations.name: OpenStreetMap
apiIntegrations.label: OpenStreetMap Data Pipeline
apiIntegrations.description: Custom data extraction and processing pipeline for OpenStreetMap data with specialized filters and transformations

webDevelopment.name: ReactDashboard
webDevelopment.label: Geospatial React Dashboard
webDevelopment.description: Interactive React-based dashboards for visualizing and interacting with geospatial data, featuring responsive design and modular components
deliverables: Custom React dashboard with geospatial components
Responsive design for all device sizes

webDevelopment.name: NextJSPortal
webDevelopment.label: Next.js Geospatial Portal
webDevelopment.description: Full-featured Next.js application with server-side rendering, static site generation, and dynamic routes optimized for geospatial content and AI integration
deliverables: Server-side and static rendering where appropriate

webDevelopment.name: FastAPIBackend
webDevelopment.label: FastAPI Geospatial Backend
webDevelopment.description: High-performance FastAPI backend optimized for geospatial data processing with automatic OpenAPI documentation and async capabilities
useCases: Integration layer for multiple data sources

webDevelopment.name: DjangoGeospatialAPI
webDevelopment.label: Django GeoDjango API
webDevelopment.description: Django-based backend with GeoDjango for complex geospatial operations, PostGIS integration, and Django REST Framework API endpoints
deliverables: REST API with Django REST Framework

webDevelopment.name: DockerDeployment
webDevelopment.label: Containerized Deployment
webDevelopment.description: Docker containerization of geospatial applications with orchestration via Docker Compose or Kubernetes for scalable, consistent deployments
deliverables: Docker configuration for all application components

webDevelopment.name: ServerlessDeployment
webDevelopment.label: Serverless Geospatial Functions
webDevelopment.description: Serverless deployment of geospatial processing functions using Vercel, AWS Lambda, or other FaaS platforms for cost-effective scaling

webDevelopment.name: DataVisualization
webDevelopment.label: Geospatial Data Visualization
webDevelopment.description: Custom interactive visualizations for geospatial data using D3.js, deck.gl, or other specialized libraries with animation and drill-down capabilities

webDevelopment.name: ProgressiveWebApp
webDevelopment.label: Geospatial Progressive Web App
webDevelopment.description: Offline-capable progressive web application for field operations with local data storage, synchronization, and mobile-optimized UI
deliverables: Progressive Web App with offline capabilities

webDevelopment.name: AuthSystem
webDevelopment.label: Geospatial Authentication System
webDevelopment.description: Specialized authentication and authorization system with location-based permissions, role-based access control, and secure API key management
deliverables: Role-based access control for geospatial data
